items.summary: Implement head-first power-on animation for the eagle logo where neon energy originates from the eagle head and instantly spreads across the full logo during entry
Apply strongest electric blue neon glow on the eagle head and eyes that is visible from the first frame and creates the visual impression of an energy source
Create smooth energy spread effect that flows from head to wings to full body over 0.4-0.6 seconds with subtle light propagation, avoiding flashing or harsh transitions
Implement three-layer neon glow system consisting of inner illumination inside eagle head, medium glow around outline, and soft outer ambient aura behind head
Add cinematic light bloom burst at the eagle head when animation starts, with optional subtle shimmer sweep across wings once
After entry animation completes, stabilize glow into continuous soft breathing pulse with the head remaining slightly brighter than the rest of the eagle
Use GPU-accelerated transform animations only, do not animate glow opacity from zero, and ensure glow exists before animation begins for optimal performance
